name: White Day2: The Flower That Tells Lies - EP1
name_original: White Day2: The Flower That Tells Lies - EP1
description:
Released in 2001, 'White Day: A Labyrinth Named School' is the most famous horror game in Korea. Recognized for its unique oriental horror setting in the school and gameplay, many players are still enjoying previous game even after 20 years.

‘White Day2: The Flower That Tells Lies' is the official sequel to the first game 'White Day: A Labyrinth Named School', and is staged again at Yeondu High School on the night of March 14, with the disturbance on the eve of White Day yet to be fully resolved.

The characters come to the closed school and will be faced hidden truths as they discover the secrets of the previous incident and navigate through the lies they have been told.

It consists of three episodes, and each episode progresses from the point of view of different characters at the same time and place, facing each ending.

The player's choice affects the actions of other characters, and the story of each episode develops in various ways. Depending on the story progressed in episode 2, a different ending may unfold when playing episode 1 again.

Yeondu High School awaits you once again.

Discover the truth hidden behind a myriad of deceptions.
